customRule.value: {{/^[A-Z0-9]{3,15}$/.test(components.textinput1.value) ? queries.getPromoCodes.data.filter((codeDetails) => codeDetails.promo_code == components.textinput1.value).length == 0 ? true : "Promo Code already exits!" : "Invalid Promo Code!"}}
